effect_entries.effect:
Optionally records wireless, Wi-Fi, and Battle Frontier battles.

Tracks Battle Points earned in the Battle Frontier, and stores commemorative prints.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records wireless, Wi-Fi, or Battle Frontier battles, and stores points.

flavor_text_entries.text:
友達との　勝負や
特殊な　施設での　勝負を
記録できる　かっこいい　機械。

An amazing device that can record a
battle between friends or the battles
at certain special battle facilities.

Fantastico dispositivo che registra le lotte
tra amici o quelle che hanno luogo in alcuni
edifici dedicati alla lotta.

Misterioso Huevo con dibujos que obtienes del
Sr. Pokémon. Nadie sabe qué contiene.

Ein tolles Gerät, um Kämpfe zwischen Freunden
oder Kämpfe in einer speziellen Kampfeinrichtung
aufzuzeichnen.

Un appareil utile permettant d’enregistrer les
combats entre amis et ceux ayant lieu dans
un bâtiment de combat.

친구와의 승부나
특수한 시설에서의 승부를
기록할 수 있는 멋있는 기계.

ともだち　との　しょうぶや
とくしゅな　しせつでの　しょうぶを
きろくできる　かっこいい　きかい。

An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

Appareil utile permettant d’enregistrer
les combats entre amis et ceux ayant
lieu dans un bâtiment de combat.

An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.

An amazing device that can record a
battle either between friends or at a
special battle facility.
